roleset.name: to divest of a weapon or weapons, render harmless, taking away weapons, disarm
roleset.note: DISARM-V NOTES: Literal understanding of this roleset corresponds to VN class cheat-10.6, emotional "disarming" to VN class amuse-31.1. (from disarm.01-v)
DISARMING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, disarm.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1, cheat-10.6. (from disarming.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Often [con artists]-1 will try [*-1]to disarm their victims by [*-2] emphasizing similarities between them .

example.name: With Arg 2
example.text: The most urgent task is *PRO* to disarm North Korea of its nuclear weapons.

example.name: argMs
example.text: the slow disarming going on right now is n't doing anything - because we could get right back into a nuclear arms race at the drop of a hat

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: They used the guise of a state of emergency to carry out their disarming of the people.
